name: bandcomb-parser
description: 3GPP E-UTRA, MR-DC and NR band combination related capabilities parsing library

scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist && npm run build-esm && npm run build-cjs
scripts.build-esm: shx rm -rf dist/esm && npx tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json
scripts.build-cjs: shx rm -rf dist/cjs && npx tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json

author: Seokseong Jeon <seokseong@jeon.engineer> (https://github.com/somidad)
